data.text:
"World's Strongest" ―an Uma Musume chasing that goal, is now here 
in France competing against veterans to that end!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>"World's Strongest" ―an Uma Musume chasing that goal, is now here 
<story>in France competing against veterans to that end!

data.text:
In this exceptional, extended campaign, it's no exaggeration to 
say that strong determination is apparent in her running!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>In this exceptional, extended campaign, it's no exaggeration to 
<story>say that strong determination is apparent in her running!

data.text:
Now, they round the final corner in to the final stretch! 
Taking the outside, she enters the spurt!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Now, they round the final corner in to the final stretch! 
<story>Taking the outside, she enters the spurt!

data.text:
So strong! She's leaving behind last year's Prix 
de l'Arc de Triomphe winner, as well as this 
generation of Europe's representatives!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>So strong! She's leaving behind last year's Prix 
<story>de l'Arc de Triomphe winner, as well as this 
<story>generation of Europe's representatives!

data.text:
An easy victory! She pulls ahead 2 lengths, 
3 lengths, and crosses the goal!!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>An easy victory! She pulls ahead 2 lengths, 
<story>3 lengths, and crosses the goal!!

data.text:
Against veterans from around the world, she claims a magnificent 
victory in France's G1 the 『Grand Prix de Saint-Cloud』!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Against veterans from around the world, she claims a magnificent 
<story>victory in France's G1 the 『Grand Prix de Saint-Cloud』!

data.text:
El Condor Pasa! 
Once again, she's delivered a big dream to all the fans in Japan!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>El Condor Pasa! 
<story>Once again, she's delivered a big dream to all the fans in Japan!

data.text: Bueno! Even out in the world, El is in perfect condition!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Bueno! Even out in the world, El is in perfect condition!

data.text:
Now……the goal I've been aiming for, the 
『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is already within arms reach!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Now……the goal I've been aiming for, the 
<story>『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is already within arms reach!

data.text:
『That dream of victory in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, 
is one step closer to becoming reality!』
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『That dream of victory in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, 
<story>is one step closer to becoming reality!』

data.text:
『Will El Condor Pasa be able to achieve this feat? 
The fans' expectations have probably never been higher!』
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『Will El Condor Pasa be able to achieve this feat? 
<story>The fans' expectations have probably never been higher!』

data.text: ……El-chan, amazing……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……El-chan, amazing……!

data.text:
The champions, Seiun Sky and Mejiro Bright were defeated in the 
『Spring Tenno Sho』 by Special Week――
data.processed:
<story>The champions, Seiun Sky and Mejiro Bright were defeated in the 
<story>『Spring Tenno Sho』 by Special Week――

data.text:
On this day, to show our appreciation to 
those girls, we were throwing a party.
data.processed:
<story>On this day, to show our appreciation to 
<story>those girls, we were throwing a party.

data.text:
Well then, we'll have today's star, Special 
Week, take it from here with a toast!!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Well then, we'll have today's star, Special 
<story>Week, take it from here with a toast!!

data.text: Sounds good, Special Week-san!
data.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
data.processed: <story>Sounds good, Special Week-san!

data.text: I was waiting for this~!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>I was waiting for this~!

data.text:
Ah, well, um!! 
The reason I was able to keep winning until now, was everyone's――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah, well, um!! 
<story>The reason I was able to keep winning until now, was everyone's――

data.text: Cheers!!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Cheers!!

data.text: Ueeeeh!? C-cheers!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeeeh!? C-cheers!!

data.text:
Lately, the number of articles about Spe-chan have increased a lot, huh? 
Saying things like the "Golden Generation's" Derby Uma 
Musume isn't just a fluke!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Lately, the number of articles about Spe-chan have increased a lot, huh? 
<story>Saying things like the "Golden Generation's" Derby Uma 
<story>Musume isn't just a fluke!

data.text: Yeah, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was cool too.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Yeah, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was cool too.

data.text:
She's always originally had the potential but, now she's able to 
display her true strength while running!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's always originally had the potential but, now she's able to 
<story>display her true strength while running!

data.text: Uwaa~h! Really!? Thank you very much~!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Uwaa~h! Really!? Thank you very much~!

data.text:
Actually, even I've been thinking that I've changed a lot from before! 
Like, being able to run with confidence……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Actually, even I've been thinking that I've changed a lot from before! 
<story>Like, being able to run with confidence……!

data.text:
This Spring she entered the Senior class, and Special Week's 
results so far have culminated in 3 consecutive wins, including 
this G1 win at the 『Spring Tenno Sho』.
data.processed:
<story>This Spring she entered the Senior class, and Special Week's 
<story>results so far have culminated in 3 consecutive wins, including 
<story>this G1 win at the 『Spring Tenno Sho』.

data.text: That promising start, was the materialization of her own feelings.
data.processed: <story>That promising start, was the materialization of her own feelings.

data.text:
I suppose you could call it a present for Special Week-san―― 
but there was some wonderful news.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I suppose you could call it a present for Special Week-san―― 
<story>but there was some wonderful news.

data.text: Wonderful news……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Wonderful news……?

data.text:
For the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』―― 
It seems that you're leading in fan votes, Spe.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>For the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』―― 
<story>It seems that you're leading in fan votes, Spe.

data.text: Eh……eeeh!? I-I am!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Eh……eeeh!? I-I am!?

data.text:
It's probably a lot of pressure on you but, 
you could say that it's proof of just how many 
expectations Spe's running has gathered.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It's probably a lot of pressure on you but, 
<story>you could say that it's proof of just how many 
<story>expectations Spe's running has gathered.

data.text:
It means that Spe has been pushing forward strongly enough that 
the fans have showed their support by voting for her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It means that Spe has been pushing forward strongly enough that 
<story>the fans have showed their support by voting for her.

data.text: Forward……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Forward……

data.text:
Now that you mention it, compared to when you first transferred 
here, you've really gotten more reliable!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Now that you mention it, compared to when you first transferred 
<story>here, you've really gotten more reliable!

data.text: Eh……!? Is that how you see it!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Eh……!? Is that how you see it!?

data.text:
But, from now on, your races will continue! But for today, we'll 
eat to our hearts content, and increase our presence that way!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>But, from now on, your races will continue! But for today, we'll 
<story>eat to our hearts content, and increase our presence that way!

data.text: Presence……! I see! In that case, then I shouldn't hold back!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Presence……! I see! In that case, then I shouldn't hold back!

data.text: Alright, in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 and eating, I'll do my best!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Alright, in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 and eating, I'll do my best!

data.text:
Um, everyone! 
Thank you very much for today!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um, everyone! 
<story>Thank you very much for today!

data.text:
For treating me to a good meal, and getting praised by everyone, 
you could say that I've refreshed my spirits too――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>For treating me to a good meal, and getting praised by everyone, 
<story>you could say that I've refreshed my spirits too――

data.text:
I'm going to work harder than before, 
and continue to chase my dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I'm going to work harder than before, 
<story>and continue to chase my dreams!

data.text:
I still don't know what it takes to become 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" though―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I still don't know what it takes to become 
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" though―

data.text:
As a way of repaying everyone that's supported me thus far, 
I'll definitely take hold of my dream!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>As a way of repaying everyone that's supported me thus far, 
<story>I'll definitely take hold of my dream!

data.text:
Uoooooooh~! You're so conscientious, Spe-chan! 
We'll keep cheering you oooon~~!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooooh~! You're so conscientious, Spe-chan! 
<story>We'll keep cheering you oooon~~!

data.text:
Yes, we'll become your strength whenever you need it. So show us 
what it means to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Yes, we'll become your strength whenever you need it. So show us 
<story>what it means to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text:
Special Week's contemporaries were called the 
"Golden Generation", so with all those champions present, getting results 
would by no means be easy.
data.processed:
<story>Special Week's contemporaries were called the 
<story>"Golden Generation", so with all those champions present, getting results 
<story>would by no means be easy.

data.text:
In truth, she had already had several bitter experiences, 
however, she continued to run.
data.processed:
<story>In truth, she had already had several bitter experiences, 
<story>however, she continued to run.

data.text:
Just like when I was running today and from now on, I think 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is probably somewhere ahead.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Just like when I was running today and from now on, I think 
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is probably somewhere ahead.

data.text: Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.

data.text: Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text: That big dream, "Japan's #1"――
data.processed: <story>That big dream, "Japan's #1"――

data.text:
For her dream, as a trainer, I'll have to properly renew my 
feelings of wanting to support her.
data.processed:
<story>For her dream, as a trainer, I'll have to properly renew my 
<story>feelings of wanting to support her.
